Articles.Content:
Hey, I\'ve been playing the game for about a week now and love it!

I do have one question though.

Will the game ever be put into a .iso (Windows installer)?

I need a .iso to be able to play the game on linux, (I dual-boot Win 7 and Fedora 16) and it gets annoying having to restart my comp to play it.

Using a linux program and a installer .iso, I will be able to play it on linux.

Welcome!

Happy launching.

Enjoy your time playing KSP!

-Joey73101

(YES FIRST POST!!)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
